name: Bohemian Rhapsody
author: Queen
lyrics: [00:00.21]Is this the real life? Is this just fantasy?
[00:06.60]Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality
[00:14.36]Open your eyes, look up to the skies and see
[00:24.10]I'm just a poor boy, I need no sympathy
[00:30.01]Because I'm easy come, easy go, little high, little low
[00:37.51]Any way the wind blows doesn't really matter to me, to me
[01:13.90]But now I've gone and thrown it all away
[01:20.90]Mama, ooh, didn't mean to make you cry
[01:30.91]If I'm not back again this time tomorrow
[01:35.41]Carry on, carry on as if nothing really matters
[01:58.90]Sends shivers down my spine, body's aching all the time
[02:12.65]Gotta leave you all behind and face the truth
[02:19.40]Mama, ooh, I don't want to die
[02:29.40]I sometimes wish I'd never been born at all
[03:03.41]I see a little silhouetto of a man
[03:05.90]Scaramouche, Scaramouche, will you do the Fandango
[03:09.65]Thunderbolt and lightning, very, very fright'ning me
[03:20.30](I'm just a poor boy, nobody loves me)
[03:23.19]He's just a poor boy from a poor family
[03:26.20]Spare him his life from this monstrosity
[03:31.11]Easy come, easy go, will you let me go?
[03:33.86]Bismillah! No, we will not let you go
[03:37.02](Let him go) Bismillah! We will not let you go
[03:39.77](Let him go) Bismillah! We will not let you go
[03:43.02](Let me go) Will not let you go
[03:44.77](Let me go) Will not let you go
[03:46.28](Let me go) Ah, no, no, no, no, no, no, no
[03:51.27](Oh mamma mia, mamma mia) Mama mia, let me go
[03:54.27]Beelzebub has a devil put aside for me, for me, for me
[04:11.26]So you think you can stone me and spit in my eye?
[04:17.42]So you think you can love me and leave me to die?
[04:22.41]Oh, baby, can't do this to me, baby!
[04:29.17]Just gotta get out, just gotta get right outta here!

name: Blank Space
author: Taylor Swift
lyrics: [00:08.32]Nice to meet you, where you been?
[00:17.82]"Oh, my God, look at that face
[00:30.83]I can read you like a magazine
[00:35.81]And I know you heard about me
[00:40.29]I'm dying to see how this one ends
[00:45.03]I can make the bad guys good for a weekend
[00:50.53]Or it's gonna go down in flames
[00:53.02]You can tell me when it's over, mmh
[00:55.51]If the high was worth the pain
[01:03.05]'Cause you know I love the players
[01:23.11]But I've got a blank space, baby
[01:40.84]You're the King, baby, I'm your Queen
[01:47.67]Wait, the worst is yet to come, oh, no
[01:55.95]I can make all the tables turn
[02:07.71]But you'll come back each time you leave
[02:10.45]'Cause, darling, I'm a nightmare dressed like a daydream
[02:15.44]Or it's gonna go down in flames
[02:17.94]You can tell me when it's over, mmh
[02:20.46]If the high was worth the pain
[02:27.99]'Cause you know I love the players
[02:47.95]But I've got a blank space, baby
[02:53.44]Boys only want love if it's torture
[02:57.76]Don't say I didn't say, I didn't warn ya
[03:03.27]Boys only want love if it's torture
[03:08.00]Don't say I didn't say, I didn't warn ya
[03:15.76]Or it's gonna go down in flames
[03:18.01]You can tell me when it's over (over)
[03:20.75]If the high was worth the pain
[03:28.09]'Cause you know I love the players
[03:40.68]Or with a nasty scar (leave a nasty scar)
[03:48.18]But I've got a blank space, baby

name: Fanatica Sensual
author: Plan B
lyrics: [00:21.41]Y a escuchar su voz cuando se agita
[00:30.15]Si le hablo malo se pone intranquila
[00:33.17]Pasa su mano por todo su cuerpo
[00:36.17]Cuando le digo todo lo que le haría
[00:42.16]Y eso que solo es una foto mía
[00:52.40]Cada vez que hablamos me dice que quieres verme
[00:54.90]Loca por conocerme, solo piensa en ese día
[00:57.90]Ver mi fotografía es lo que le daña la mente
[01:00.67]Con el cuerpo que tiene, dime quien no le daría
[01:03.66]Llama de madrugada, tan caliente como siempre
[01:06.65]Me habla de una manera, que ni yo me atrevería
[01:09.66]Veremos lo que pasa cuando me tenga de frente
[01:12.16]Es que al igual que ella, también pienso en ese día
[01:31.66]Y a escuchar su voz cuando se agita
[01:40.40]Si le hablo malo se pone intranquila
[01:43.65]Pasa su mano por todo su cuerpo
[01:46.15]Cuando le digo todo lo que le haría
[01:52.41]Y eso que solo es una foto mía
[02:01.91]Noto que le gusto cuando ella me llama
[02:04.91]Cuando me habla de travesuras en la cama
[02:07.66]Pone voz de deseo, hasta me echa fiero
[02:10.90]Que su fantasía, era cumplir la mía
[02:14.66]Poco a poco relata, lo que le pasa en su casa
[02:21.90]De como lo prefería, con pregunta insistía
[02:23.67]Hasta que en su juego me envolvía
[02:41.91]Y a escuchar su voz cuando se agita
[02:50.92]Si le hablo malo se pone intranquila
[02:53.65]Pasa su mano por todo su cuerpo
[02:56.66]Cuando le digo todo lo que le haría
[03:02.66]Y eso que solo es un foto mía
